text:
This screen lists predefined albums. Talks are contained within these albums.

For each album, the number at the top right is the count of talks contained in that album. The number below it is the total duration of these talks.

Touch an album to get the list of talks within it.

The first section of  albums order talks in various ways, such as by Date or Speaker.

The Personal section below allows you to view talks that you recently noted, shared or listened to, and the Custom Album secton allows you to create your own albums.

The Sangha albums show talks that other people in the community have recently shared or listened to.
